file.name: negative7.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API Overview
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/":
    get:
      operationId: listVersionsv2
      summary: List API versions
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 200 response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - message
                  - code
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                  code:
                    type: integer
                    minimum: 100
                    maximum: 600
                default: { "message": "hello", "code": 200 }

Error: parse: paths: /: get: listVersionsv2: responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse default: unexpected type: "object"
